website_summaries.verdict: A good auto-navigating drone for beginning drone pilots and aerial cinematographers.
pros: Provides flight-friendly features such as one-key takeoff and landings, making it easier to fly for beginners
Drone uses GPS and GLONASS position for better location coverage and accuracy
cons: The 1080P rotating camera needs an individual SD card to store images and videos

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little apprehensive to purchase this drone... I always read the bad reviews. got this drone for my son's 12th birthday, arrived quickly, we followed the connection and calibration instruction video, and it connected straight away, no problem! The video quality is good and it is very easy to fly with very little practice. Great drone for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: After my first use the front left propeller stopped working. Will not fly. Had high Hope's but was not to be let down. Update:They did not have any hesitation on replacing my drone. Gave me high hopes and a 2nd chance for a great experience. Cant wait to fly again. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: bahoti

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this ! For the price this drone is great. This is a drone, packed with features that make it easy to learn to fly. Micro USB charging, really easy, and you can use a power bank to recharge on the go! Photos are automatically sent to your cellphone.even with medium wind, it stays firm and hold position.lt's easy, no more than 5 minutes and you a ready to flight. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: TKC

customer_reviews.title: This is a good drone,it can also be controlled when the wind is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good drone,it can also be controlled when the wind is strong。 If the battery can become more longer will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice! Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this drone. The package arrived in perfect conditions and included all parts and accessories. The unpacking experience was very positive as the Manufacturer uses good-quality packing materials. The product is well built and finished. The innauguration flight was brief due to climate conditions but the drone behaved as expected. So far, this product has met all my expectations and I am looking forward to my next flight.
customer_reviews.author: Rod B.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Made of cheap plastic and is very unstable in flight. Poor range and the return to home feature does not work well. I had to override the feature and control it myself to prevent loosing it. The measurements are also deceiving as they must be from the tips of each propeller if turned just right. Also, the camera tilt function is very poor. It will randomly tilt the wrong direction or not function at all. It’s been returned...
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: Returning this item
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband and here is his review: I have a cheap drone I got a year ago, and wanted to upgrade to a better one so I found this drone. I cannot get this drone to function correctly at all. Tried in many places to get GPS signal but always says weak signal. When you finally get it to work it is very unstable and is all over the place, even indoors with absolutely no breeze. Only way for this to work is is no GPS mode and that is unstable too. Very disappointing as this looked like a good drone and was excited to fly it and never got the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bloomquist

customer_reviews.title: Had a great time using this to take pictures on our vacation
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get some great shots only the drone could take. This was very easy to fly right out of the box. The features are easy to use and the beginners feature of only letting it go so far was nice as you learned how to control it. I would recommend this to anyone as this is a very stable unit with a lot of great features.
customer_reviews.author: patschw

customer_reviews.title: Great reasonably priced drone
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the Phantom 4 that we use at work and has many of the same features. The camera is decent for the price and will take decent aerial shots for a hobbyist. I wish it had collision avoidance, but thats a lot to ask for a sub $200 drone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Really fast shipping, easy to fly, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy app download. Micro USB charging, really easy, and you can use a power bank to recharge on the go! Really easy flying, even with medium wind, it stays firm and hold position. I saw some reviews about difficult to set up. If you follow instructions step by step, it's easy, no more than 5 minutes and you a ready to flight. And a bonus, Photos are automatically sent to your cel phone! I'm really happy, and considering to buy another, since I have two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best drone ever !!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this !! It takes amazing pictures !! He also loves the fact that it comes back to you :) The video it takes is also incredible . Definitely would recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Drone at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am new to world of drone and ordered the get my feet wet. I am glad that I ordered this one, it was easy to calibrate and I was flying within 5 minutes, that is including the download of the app. In regards to the actual flying of the T25, I don't think it could be any easier, with the 3 different speeds and the auto return the learning curve was next to nothing. The photos and videos came out great as well. I would recommend the T25 or any of the other Potensic drones to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: StanleyG

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for first time
customer_reviews.text: I like the altitude hold and GPS for beginners. After set-up I was able to hit the one button lift off and after it rose about 5 feet it just kind of waited for me to do something. Just what I needed as a inexperienced beginner. My only problem remains is getting the app to respond as per the instructions. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but so far no luck with that but I can fly around with out the app on the smartphone. Only flown 3 times so far but I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pay $100 more for a DJI!  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Thought for the price this would be a great starter drone. Set up is difficult. Set up takes over half Battery life so flight time is short. Battery only lasted like 5 minutes so after set up battery would only last another 3 minutes possible 4 min depending on camera usage. Now battery is stuck on can’t charge or drain it .This is my second drone purchase and both failures. If you want one just spend $100 more on the DJI. Returning this one glad I can do that feel bad for the others that can’t return there drone.
customer_reviews.author: GeneDev

customer_reviews.title: before I give bad review
customer_reviews.text: Got my drone pretty fast. Takes a long time to charge but I decided If it works great I buy an extra battery. Hmm At the moment It does seem a lil difficult to fly but that might seem to be that It does not Fly? I downloaded the app did the Quick start. First It talks about Lights? Most important to me is when lights are solid! They never go solid even after I followed Instructions to turn GPS off. Camera works! But no Fly! I will see If support helps me? Maybe Im just lucky get a bad drone? I will certainly post see how this pans out after their support
customer_reviews.author: john c mable

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone for beginners and for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was the first drone I have purchased and am quite impressed with its functionality and flying ability. At first, I had issues with battery charging, however, this was quickly resolved by the seller (great support!) and had the opportunity to fly. I was impressed with it's ability, even for a basic drone. It was flyable in 15 mph winds, video was very acceptable and liked the fact it came with extra props and guards. Flight time is short and really the only main fault. Rating based on capability and price.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck M

customer_reviews.title: CORRECTION: Company Customer Service is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a drone that is relatively easy to use and has "follow me" ability, a cool feature. The first attempt at flying this drone was a complete failure. I returned the drone, got a refund, but then something surprising happened. The Potensic company heard about my problem and sent me a FREE replacement drone(!) After waiting for the weather to get in an optimum state for testing, I tried flying the drone again.. The drone , after configuring the compass and GPS sensors, part of the wacky setup process, flew very well. The drone started up (hooray!), then immediately spun into a very controlled hover. Very nice to see that sellers still appreciate their customers.
customer_reviews.author: H. A Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Need - setup with clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult and poor setup instructions. I am quite irritated and most likely will return it if I can't get it to connect. I can go as far as step 1,step 2. The issue is connecting wifi per instructions to Potensic...... Network. What app do they refer to.?
customer_reviews.author: Ravi A

customer_reviews.title: My second drone
customer_reviews.text: My first drone was a cheap purchase and not very easy to fly. I saw a review of the Potensic T25 in the news app on my ipad the best drone you can buy for under $200. I read some reviews on amazon and bought it. This one was easy to set up and fly. The camera takes very good pictures. I have a small area in my back yard to practice and have a lot to learn. i am very satisfied with it and would recommend it to anyone looking to buy a drone.
customer_reviews.author: William Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for about a week. It has a 3 minute battery life and will barely get off the ground. For almost 200.00 this is a total rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Allsop

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner Drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st drone, initially I was thinking about purchasing a DJI drone, but was not prepared to spend that much money as I don't plan to use it for professional video recording. This drone does not have the greatest build quality due to it's price point, but overall I'm satisfied with this drone and its functionality, it's a good drone for casual fly, I would recommend this for people who want to have the fun of flying a drone without spending big bucks, but if you plan to do serious video production work this is not the best drone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these drones so much and I purchased a cheap one before, which is very easy making but can't fly too high. But this one is perfect, he loves it. We tried it during the holiday and it works perfectly. Firstly, it is easy to use and there are lots of videos I can find on the website. It has many functions that make it full of the feeling of technology. Besides, I am satisfied with the quality of the pictures. I think it is a great buy at a similar price zone.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kind of remote control aircraft for the first time, and the shape of the product is very beautiful. The aircraft is light and easy to install. If you are using a drone for the first time, be careful and not play indoors. It was flexible beyond my imagination, so there was an accident. It slammed into my window quickly, but fortunately the glass was not broken. Playing outdoors, you can play easily. It can be easily connected to my iphone. I can see the clear scene under the sky through the camera of the airplane, and I can also take photos and videos. It is really a good product at this price. You can own it
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I thought to use. - Follow Up on first review
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning how to fly this drone but on my first try at lease I did not crash it. It has a return to last location selection that did just that, thankfully. I would recommend this to a friend. Follow-up on above review. After trying it I found that it had to be calibrated every time I turned it off and back on again. It was either made that way or was defective. In any case, it was way too much trouble to do that every time so I returned it since it was not mentioned on the description of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Makini

customer_reviews.title: Great drone and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great drone for the money. I am a beginner drone pilot. This drone has a beginner mode that makes it easy then can be reset to advanced. One problem was that the “ready to fly” status on my iPhone was in Chinese. Sent an email to Protensic customer service and they got back to me next day with the answer. Just had to go to Control screen on the iphone then the menu icon and press save. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: John Howard

customer_reviews.title: Be careful in the wind
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for beginners, I am very pleased with how easy it was to get flying. Some notes first the flight time states 10 minutes but once you start recording you cut that time in half. Second thing is due to the extremely light weight you have to be careful in the wind, I was flying about 50 meters up and the wind took it away but once it went out of range the auto return home kicked in and it landed inches from takeoff. I would definatley recommend this drone for beginners. The picture quality is very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: TazmanianDevils

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for the value, alot of features
customer_reviews.text: Alright, being a drone I wanted to wait a while before writing this review. The drone itself is great, its lightweight and all the features from the auto takeoff and hover, to the return home to land, all work as they should. The only issue I've had, is the drone being so light, that any wind at all makes the video and photos shaky, so to get good quality photos and video you need to fly this drone in absolutely no wind, which is a very rare occurance, especially where I live. Overall for the price, it is a good drone with a decent amount of features for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good drone, with it had guards
customer_reviews.text: Used for home inspection. After a scare I got this so my husband could safely check if a residence was occupied, and to inspect the roof/gutters without climbing on a possibly rotten roof. The drone was easy for him to use, the video quality is great, and if there’s a light breeze it fights pretty well. Within the first week (learning period) he put the thing in a tree, smacked it into a wall, and on several occasions lost it when the battery died. That’s pretty normal but the bad part is that because the propellers don’t have covers or guards around them he’d break at least one each time. Will be buying one with guards next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't function as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if it did what was promised. Transmission distance is not 900ft, it's more like 100. Big difference. The battery life is not 10 minutes, it's 5. The remote doesn't work properly, and the takeoff button only works 1 in 20 attempts. The gyroscope won't stabilize the drone. It can't fly properly without flailing wildly about, making it impossible to drive. It also ruins any video, as well as the follow me function.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Had issues, but Customer Support helped!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: still have not received batteries....smh. Update: After contacting customer support, they are sending me two new batteries out and Amazon gave me a partial refund of $30 due to the inconvenience. I have a new battery right now and the drone flies wonderfully. Only 8-10 minutes of flight time and I hate how you have to calibrate it every time you turn it on. My drone came today.... THE BATTERY WILL NOT WORK. It won't even charge!!!!! No blue blinking lights or anything per the instructions. I AM NOT HAPPY. The battery is Even swollen in the center. The drone itself has dirt on the bottom of it from it being used previously.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky2012

customer_reviews.title: Good First Drone
customer_reviews.text: First drone I've ever owned or flown. Took about ten minutes to get everything setup and in the air. Managed to cover a 15 acre plot, but I wouldn't say it was easy. Like anything else, just because something is simple doesn't mean it is easy. I had issues with controlling the drone but the quick stop function saved the drone from flying into danger. The customer support offered a quick trip guide that helped solve some of the control issues and I'm ready for round two. Again I would recommend this as a FIRST drone. If you have owned a drone and looking for something more advanced you're going to have to move further up market.
customer_reviews.author: Kipring Payne

customer_reviews.title: Drone didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This may just my fault not understanding how much drones cost, but this drone didn’t work at our house. I was told later I would have to spend a lot more money to get one to work here.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good drone but the battery doesn't last more than 8 minutes and it loses connection sometimes. That kind of stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: I tried to do a update, but Amazon wouldn’t let me do it. Here’s my update, the company reached out to me and replaced the controller that didn’t work. I received a the new controller and the Drone worked great, there is a small learning curve, but it is easy to fly and control. I highly recommend purchasing it to learn how to fly a drone. The video has been nice and the flight time is nice, I would recommend you buy a couple more batteries, once you fly it you will want to fly it more.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reigel

customer_reviews.title: It flys. No more.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life will only get you about 6 minutes of flight. It flys decent enough, not much speed or agility though. I will be returning mine after 2 flights. It just does not perform nor is the camera of any notable quality. I do not recommend this drone... AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: It can survive the elements
customer_reviews.text: While flying the T25 in the central Texas heat a “dust devil “ suddenly sucked it up and auto land and shut down had no effect. It finally fell to the ground about a 1/4 mile away in very heavy brush. With the help of neighbors we looked four times in a two week period with no luck, August 2019. Today December 30, 2019 one of my neighbors found the T-25 ! I test flew it twice today and it worked great, and haven’t tested the battery that was in it or the camera. Unbelievable !
customer_reviews.author: Candace Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Great little device for the money spent. The only issue I had is that battery was malfunctioning all the time but the developers were very quick with responses on all my emails and sent me new battery already. We use this drone to make a short professional video of our construction projects from the air. Will definitely recommend this device and the developer. Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: The SRH keeps it from getting five stars
customer_reviews.text: I chose this model for the Smart Return Home function. I read the entire instruction booklet, then set to flying in my backyard to check on my free chickens. Everything was great until I clicked on the return home. It flew so fast in a straight line that I could not stop it before it crashed into a pole, and fell in the pool. A Smart Return should be to follow the same path back as original. fix this, and I would be willing to buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: Good image and pretty big
customer_reviews.text: Thanks a great drone. The first time could not start. We forgot to read the guide about step 5 and 6. We should pick up the drone rotate our body in one full circle(360). And so far everything is cool. The plastic is strong. When struck with an obstacle, the bladed in place where the hinge is very convenient. The drone is not damaged. Photos and videos are also clear. If you press the GPS button again, it will turn off. The drone returned to the place from where it took off.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Wd

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have flown it several times today. It works quit well. The camera is a little lacking. But it is easy to fly. I had trouble with the first one. (might have been on my end). But had a replacement the next day. GREAT SERVICE. For the money it works very well. Remember, if you spend $150. You have to expect $150 performance. If you compare or want a high end unit. Then pay $850. Or higher. I plan on using this until I decide I will use a high end unit. But I am happy with the way this works.
customer_reviews.author: RALPH  MANN

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is really good quailty. I've been able to take some really good sky cover pictures. Once you gey the hang of how to operate the drone it is a lot of fun watching it takeoff and land. Everything is busyso simply to use, with quick start instructions right on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Dwana

customer_reviews.title: Takes off on its own and doesn’t come back.
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money! I’ve only flown this 4 times and the last two times the drone just takes off on its own! I hit gps to bring it home. Last time it came back but landed down the road. This time I hit gps as soon as it took off and it never came back. I have looked everywhere for it but it’s gone. I have flown my friends DJI drone many times and never had this problem! I was scared to invest to much money but I think I will invest in a better one that won’t just fly off and not come back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mossor

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: first off this is the first drone I've bought....so with that said it took me a little bit to learn how to operate it..after about 20 minutes of reading and just playing with controls i was able to fly it around my back yard..mind you I cant win a drone race but i was able to fly it...now i just have to get a sim card in order to use the onboard camera. The app for phone is abit more of a challenge..got to work on that...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Huttton

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, you will be disappointed.. I flew this drone in an open grass field
customer_reviews.text: Pros - it flies far -live video -easy landing and takeoff -comes back on it's own -looks cool -fast -easy return Cons - camera barely moves - not stable at all, even if there's barely any wind -moves forwards on it's own when flying -camera quality is less than ok -in "follow me" mode, it can barely keep up with you even with me just walking -claims altitude hold but drones goes up and down on it's own, even crash itself -battery dies fast -it takes forever to charge battery -the "draw the dot" feature never worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Kurt U

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: So far, So good. it came fully charged and ready to go out of the box. A few snaps of the propeller guards and I was off! Controls are really easy to learn and it flies stable, so long as the wind is low. Any decent wind and it struggles, but that is to be expected. Pictures from the camera were pretty good. The only real problem I had with it was that every time it is powered on, you have to go through a calibration routine. A minor inconvenience though and still fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Bking2nd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone!  Stable, flies smoothly and great camera.
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this drone for the price. My 9 year old had it flying around the street and yard within minutes and it is by far the best one we've had yet (on the sub-$200 price range). Potensic Support is also amazing. We had a minor issue with the wi-fi controller that they fixed via a replacement part within a few days. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my forty-year-old husband, who had been wanting a drone for years. We had experienced earlier, cheaper drones when kids we knew were gifted them, and seen them crash and get ruined right away; ease of operation was a feature we knew was important. This one was easy to operate from the get-go! I really like how it takes off automatically, and just as easily returns to home and lands safely. Pairing with a smart phone is nice for controls and sharing pictures/video. It takes decent pictures. The battery life is a bit short, though. Not fully 8 minutes as advertised. A spare battery would increase the fun. Overall, we are very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Audra Neunkirchner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly and has beginner settings.
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to fly. My 7yr old likes flying it. The controls are easy to use and it has auto return and low battery warning. The app on the phone is kinda sluggish. Overall I think it should be a little cheaper (cost) then it is but I dont regret buying it. It's a good drone for beginners. It flys for about 8-10 min on a charge and take about 1 1/2 hrs to charge the dead battery
customer_reviews.author: Ajanderson007

customer_reviews.title: Only take 10 mins to figure out how to control
customer_reviews.text: First of all this is my first drone, it's quite easy to assembled , and easy to control in the sky . I'm very happy with this drone as Christmas gift from my girlfriend. Quality are great not like other cheap one. For an beginners like me only take 10 minutes to figure out how to control it. And GPS return are very useful, HD camera work flawlessly, video and images are clearly nothing to complain 5 Star
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a lot of fun to fly. It has many features found in much more expensive drones but at an affordable price.. the customer support is great and responded very quickly when I had some questions. 👍👍. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an introductory done for my husband. Took a little effort to figure everything out but once you do it works well. The battery life is about 8 minutes which is the most disappointing part of this purchase. The second disappointment is the app which works about 50% of the time. The connection from the app drops and the app takes too long to load. Since your battery only lasts 8 minutes the app isn't really worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lathena Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life Is An Issue
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the battery in the controller and the drone battery would only last five minutes after fully charging them. The worst part was three of those five minutes were used up trying to make it connect properly. I expected a little more flying time out of this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, will build machine with terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: If you can use a PlayStation controller, you can use this drive. So far so good even with a few not so sorry landings. The battery life though, is terrible, as is the recharge time, and I'm hoping to find a way to mod it someday to accommodate a larger capacity battery. Just when you start getting the hang of it, it returns to start due to low battery life, which makes learning how to fly it a bit of a pain in the ass. I seriously hope that Potensic considers making a longer lifer battery at some point soon. Overall, does as advertised, but don't expect to be doing it for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is suspect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone for my husband to have some fun with. It’s relatively easy to fly and he is enjoying it however battery life is very short. He gets about 5 minutes of fly time before it starts beeping indicating low battery. Camera quality is quite good and once used to the controls it’s very easy to fly. He hasn’t had a crash yet. The return home GPS action works very good. The only complaint we would have is that we are frequently recharging the battery just to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chasse

customer_reviews.title: Better, good service.
customer_reviews.text: Flight time very limited, photo quality good, controls often stop working. By the time it gets adjusted and ready to fly, the battery is almost empty. I am disappointed in what I got for $160.00. Update: Potensic responded to the above concerns and sent me 2 free extra batteries. That greatly improves the flight time. Very nice of them to try to improve the issues.
customer_reviews.author: PLBoyette

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: Never flown a gps drone before only earlier ones a few time with some unhappy results. Took a half dozen low flights to build confidence then took the video on this review. It held position as it climbed and made a quick video and several photos. Very pleased with results and at the price it’s a great deal if fun. Opens a totally new hobby for me. Since it’s my first gps drone can’t offer much more than it’s been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: longrider

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT PRODUCT and so much fun. Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Potensic T25 yesterday and it is AWESOME . I read the directions and fully charged everything and took it out on its first flight today. Not much I didn’t like except I will eventually have to get another battery so I can enjoy flying it longer. Going to try and get some of my friends into it. It’s fun and so easy to fly. Looking forward to flying it again tomorrow. Thanks Potensic for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All test flights were good. Update to review.......
customer_reviews.text: All test flights were good. Controls are nice. Battery life in drone and controller are about 5 minutes for me. Other reviews reflect the same. Update to review......was promised an additional battery for a review....to date nothing...... Potensic will ask for a review in return for an additional battery....But does not send battery....Keeps asking for shipping information Buy Holly Stone.......Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: This drone is awesome. The battery clicks into the body in fitted compartment. No more pushing and twisting battery wires intonplace. The remote hold my phone so I have a screen to biw the camera. The controls are sensitive and presice. This is by far the best entry level affordable drone I've flone. It captured food HD video and pictures. I actually got this bad boy up anove out trees and back down between them without getting stuck or blown around in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Kobo

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner drone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and it is super easy. I did watch a few videos in preparation to know how to do the initial set up. Battery had just enough juice that I was able to set it up and fly it for a few seconds before it started warning me to land. Everything worked great, pretty stable hovering and the lowest speed setting is great for someone learning the controls. The camera quality is great. The controller is nice, it feels like a PS3 controller. Overall I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery Life and Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I expected this drone to have at least a 10 minute battery life, but by the time you turn on the drone, link your phone and calibrate the compass it flies for about 3-5 minutes before the battery is dead. It was easy to set up and fairly easy to fly but cheaply made and not worth the money. The controller was very flimsy and seemed cheap. For $150 I expected a little better quality. Returned and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is going to be fun.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few try's to figure out how to connect my phone to the drone but I figured out that it was a wifi setting that would not connect if it wasn't a strong signal. The app only shows the T18 but it seems to work fine with the T25. Oh be sure to watch a the videos and start your training outdoors before using it indoors. Even with the guards, the blades will scratch furniture and could knock things over. It's a birthday present for my son. I think he's going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to control a drone camera as you wished
customer_reviews.text: I have been watching a lot of drone camera videos. I would like to have my own drone videos, so I purchase one. I have been playing it for two weeks. It's easy to set up, but it takes time to get familiar with drone. The camera and its phone app can be easily connected, and the video stream is smooth. I can easily record any videos at different angles. I tested it in the park. I guess I will practice flying this drone more for the next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: First time drone owner/user. Set up was pretty easy, and once you get the start up routine down it's really very simple. I really like the interface with my phone so that pictures and videos load directly onto it without any extra downloading, memory cards, etc. Comes with lots of neat features, but with only 8 minutes of fly time you can't really use some of them (follow me, map my flight). Very lightweight so there can't be much of a wind to fly it. Overall, super pleased with this. Excellent beginner drone.
customer_reviews.author: Bonpers

customer_reviews.title: Great First Drone
customer_reviews.text: This Drone is simple, and easy to use. I would strongly recommend keeping it in beginner mode until you are comfortable with all the controls and different buttons, The App for the drone is simple to set up and just takes a few moments to connect to the drone. I wish the battery life was a little bit longer or if they included an additional battery with it. But other than that it handles well and is very smooth flying.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: great drone for price!!
customer_reviews.text: the potensic t25 drone is great! i purchased this item for my daughter and she loved it. It was really simple to setup, the step by step instructions included visuals and the adjoining app helped clarify any confusion. As for flying, I recommend only using in clear days, the drone itself can resist minor winds but that is about it. The video is also HD! I managed to get beautiful scenery photos, SD card is not included, though! It takes a little practice at first but once you get a hang of the controls, it’s a really good beginners drone.
customer_reviews.author: wenqingye

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone
customer_reviews.text: The drone flies extremely well. At first I thought that the wings were weak and it kept moving around. But it was actually me that forget to turn off the gps(silly me) With the Gps on, it flies really high and stable! The camera quality and battery life is great for its caliber. Pros: -GPS -Design -Return Home Feature Cons: Wish they had better battery life, but the drone is heavier so I can’t take off stars for that!
customer_reviews.author: Lixin Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice drone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me as a X-mas present. Since its been non- stop raining in Ohio. I was finally able to fly this drone. This is my first drone and it took many tries to fly it. I am happy with this drone. the more I fly it the easier it gets. The picture quality is good. The video quality is very good. The only problem is the 7 minute fly time . You really need two battery's. Its fun to fly and take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brady Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Quality
customer_reviews.text: The camera is HD! This drone is a very good drone. I think a very good thing about it is that you can take the battery out and (If you bought extra batteries) put a new one in. Compared to a previous drone i bought, (which broke) this is superior in every way.Yo can move the camera's angle up and down to get good shots. The video does get glitchy if you get more than 20 feet away. Also, if you leave a review, they send you a free battery!
customer_reviews.author: BDAS

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this product. It is a total waste of money. The battery only last under 10 minutes when fully charged. GPS to return home and follow me does NOT work. I bought this for myself and I tried to fly it and it just goes straight towards any tree or anything around it and falls down. If you are planning on buying this you better be a patient person that has a lot of money. I suggest to me not to buy this product because of those reasons it is not worth the money spent
customer_reviews.author: Seabrey A Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Great first drone
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone to tryout. It was easy to set up and fly for someone who hasn't flown one before. It holds its altitude and location well for as small as it is. I got it to test it out and see if I could fly one and I was impressed with it. So I returned it and got the t35 model.
customer_reviews.author: Cooter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIRTHDAY GIFT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my dad for his 72nd birthday and he LOVES it -- nicely priced and easy directions for him to follow. We all had to stand outside and watch him fly his new drone toy :-).. It is funny to hear your dad giggle -- SO WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: debbie3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to control and good camera quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone and I love it. first of all, it is easy to understand and control. I just spent a little practice in an open area and finally I was on my way. Actually, i am so surprised at the picture and video quality on phone. Finally, GPS feature is really on point. i did try to land the drone by itself by pushing the home button and it really works. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sam0320

customer_reviews.title: great read the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I can't emphasize enough. Read and follow the instructions. I've flown a number of large and small drones and this has been one of the better ones as long as the directions are followed. I madly went through the directions and failed. When I actually read word for word it was paradise. My 11 year old daughter took control and didn't total it like she did with one of my minis. We are having a bunch of fun and taking quality photos, that also took some getting used too. I told my brother we need a few of these guys for hunting and fishing and having fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had some issues with our Drone that I bought for my boyfriend but customer service was excellent. They fixed the problem and we are happy customers now. If/when we decide to upgrade I will definitely go thru this company. They made sure our issue got fixed and we were able to use the Drone. Happy customers & happy boyfriend. Now time to go enjoy the drone😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Small package able to accomplish big things.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner drone. Directions were easy to understand, and flying was a breeze. Crashed the first flight. But the 2nd time around was really smooth. It takes pics and video and connects to your phones wifi for a gps signal to follow you.i love this thing. When I get more experienced I'm gonna buy a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: K.  Righteous. E

customer_reviews.title: Best drone for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is amazing and the support team is awesome as well. The app for the phone is easy to use and even comes with video tutorials. Shortly after I purchased this drone the company reached out to me to make sure I was satisfied with the drone and even sent me an extra battery for longer use of the drone. Could not be happier with this purchase. If you are looking for a great drone this is the one you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This was my first drone purchase. I'll admit to some trepidation prior to purchase, but all my worries evaporated after I first used the drone. The initialization and orientation is foolproof, the app and remote integration is seamless, and the flight mechanics are incredibly easy to learn. I purchased two additional batteries based on reviews. One could reasonably expect about 5-7 minutes of flight time with the included battery. I don't hesitate to recommend this drone to anyone looking to have a bit of aerial fun at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: the first time I bought a drone that can take pictures
customer_reviews.text: On the whole, it is easy to assemble and control. In addition, the control of the camera is also very simple, which can be easily controlled through the mobile app on my Android phone. Good for someone who loves to travel, the battery charging time is not too long.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality video and easy to use. My only gripe would be the battery life. 15 mins goes quick.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time bought drone. I looked at similar drone, finally I chose it. When I receive my drone very excited. I opened it and test power, It is easy control and fun. My kid can play it too. Price also cheaper than others Drone. We are very happy to use T25.
customer_reviews.author: QING DING

customer_reviews.title: Good, but landing is really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Drone flies well. Camera quality isn't 1080P as far as I can see, very pixelated near the ground but probably just my lighting. Battery readings are usually always wrong, has much more charge than displayed. When throttling down from high places, drone loses a lot of stability, and getting it back is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Marco V.

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a step up but only the second drone I have owned. I'm still a novice flyer but the Potensic T25 makes it a lot easier. I am still working on learning the controls but this drone responds well. I really like the return to home feature because I'm not yet proficient with the controls. I haven't tried the follow me feature yet. The camera quality isn't professional quality but is much better than the cheaper drone I have. All in all, I would recommend this drone for someone looking for a toy-grade craft thatperforms as advertised. Also, it handles wind better than the cheapercraft but 10 mph or higher winds would make handling difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Dont buy. Crashes itself flies horribly. Super let down
customer_reviews.text: Dont understand all the good reviews. Flies horribly. Have to calibrate every time it turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone and didnt know how to operate it. Protensic went above and beyond to help me. I really appreciate their excellent customer service and superb product. Because of this experience, i will always hold their company in high esteem.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Level GPS Drone
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with drone quality and build. The drone provide good altitude and GPS hold. I did notice I had to manage altitude a little more than expected as I flew around. Slight winds did not seem to bother the little drone with some minor drifting. Battery life is not as long as advertised but the unit comes with two batteries. 1080 photos and videos are OK but low light level lost focus. The software works well on Android OS. Overall good GPS drone, good quality, and would recommend to anyone starting with GPS drones
customer_reviews.author: Doug Boone

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Fly's Well
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good quality item. It fly's as it should, but the set up has several steps and sometimes you have to go through the steps a few times to get it set up right. Other than the set up I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great well built beginner drone, stable flight and look a feel seems to be along the lines of a more expensive drone. I would highly recommend purchasing the drone to begin learning about the drone hobby, I will be posting some pictures and video once it stops raining every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Shooting stable
customer_reviews.text: Buying a drone for the first time is very stable, and the picture has amazingly clear effects on the TV. If you just start using it, don't fly at home, it will bring chaos to your home. I'm still groping, hoping that I will make better use of this drone in the future.
customer_reviews.author: KiKi

customer_reviews.title: A nice starter
customer_reviews.text: The drone parts go together easily, including the prop guards. Directions could be a bit more clear on setting up and calibrating the drone. The on-line videos do a good job. I'm happy there is a beginner mode to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia on my mind.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this drone
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this drone for my birthday I was excited to use it. I downloaded the app(that has 2 stars required for operation). The app was able to find the drone but not connect. After researching this issue I found that contacting the supplier was impossible but reviews from other costumers lead me to the fact I am not the only one with this issue. Found out the thing doesn’t work with my galaxy s9. Decided I would return it and found out the extra battery I purchased with it will cost me an additional 8 dollars to return. Amazon needs to take this off of there “recommended list”.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Kopischke

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, read for a few key points.
customer_reviews.text: To operate this all you have to have is experience playing a video game or have operated an RC car, not difficult at all. If neither, then it is really easy to pick up. The controls are very responsive so not much pressure is needed to navigate. All and all, great starter product for beginners. The only downside is the drone battery life, so, a 2nd battery is recommended for recurrent use.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Preyer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone ,it’s not really hard to use,really smooth.and the pics and video looks really good,love it !
customer_reviews.author: song

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few of the mini drones and just could not master them, if the air conditioner turned on inside the house they flipped over and crashed. This drone is easy to learn and fly, I have even flown it in light windows with no problems. For the price it works great especially if you are just getting into flying drones. It did take a minute to learn the calibration sequence which you have to do every time you insert a new battery. I would suggest purchasing extra batteries as they only last about 8 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: n8te20

customer_reviews.title: Bad remote controller. Always getting disconnected.
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had the drone more then a month. The remote control signal keeps getting disconnected to the drone after a couple minutes in flight. The only way the drone comes back is once the battery starts to die it comes back to where it started. We sent an email to customer service they told us to take a video of the remote disconnecting and you can clearly see it say on the cell phone signal lost. Customer service then just said to try a different phone. We have tried on different phones the outcome is the same. Bad remote controller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable for the average user!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Drone! Was exactly as advertised! Great Price for a novice Drone (er)!
customer_reviews.author: sharon c

customer_reviews.title: Who wants to be frustrated beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: Who here wants to be frustrated beyond belief I mean furious? Then this is for you. This is easily the worst purchase I've bought from Amazon. I literally spent an hour trying to connect with the drone what did I get about 1 minute of fly time. If you want to be so mad you want to throw this thing then definitely buy it
customer_reviews.author: Hockeyking55

customer_reviews.title: Fun to fly
customer_reviews.text: I had battery problem at the start but Customer Sservice was super helpful and sent a replacement fast. They even followed up to see how it went! It is fun to fly and takes great pictures. Watching it fly thru your phone is easier than watching it. Although you will get longer flight time if you turn off the GPS, I highly recommended not doing that. This is a fun toy to play with and get experienced with before graduating to a big drone.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I got the Drone to fly after a long time getting it to connect to the controller
customer_reviews.text: I still have yet to get the application to connect to the drone. I have tried for multiple hours trying to get it to connect but it wont. They are going to send me a new camera to see if that resolves the issue, if it does I will update my review. The beeping on the controller is extremely annoying as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sweany

customer_reviews.title: customer service is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the T25 as a treat to myself and do not have much experience with drones. I found the battery has an issue and contacted customer service and a replacement battery was shipped out to me and corrected my issue. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jw1722

product_meta.title: Potensic T25 GPS Drone , FPV RC Drone with Camera 1080P HD WiFi Live Video, Dual GPS Return Home, Quadcopter with Adjustable Wide-Angle Camera- Follow Me, Altitude Hold, Long Control Range, White
feature_bullets: [1080P HD Wi-Fi Camera]: 120° FOV and 75° Adjustable angle, captures HQ video & aerial photos. The 1080P HD camera, captures high-speed picture transmission without delay. It records all your memories while you enjoy them in real-time(Use 4-32GB 10 class or above SD card, not included).

[Dual GPS for Safe Flight]: GPS + GLONASS positioning systems provide you with the accurate positioning details of your drone. Under GPS mode, your aircraft can automatic return when it is low power or no signal received.
[Fun Follow Me Mode]: Under GPS mode and smart phone controlling, it can automatically follow your phone's position, catching every moment while you're walking, running and travelling.

[Easy For Operation]: Headless mode, altitude hold, & one key takeoff/landing for easier operation. No worry about the orientation, with a simple button press, your drone will ascend or descend, perfect for beginners.

[Farther Control Distance & VR Mode]: 2 Batteries included and Remote control distance up to 300m/985ft, so you can experience a wider worldview and enjoy a more pleasant flight experience. Watch a remote scenery through VR Goggles(not included) and enjoy FPV experience.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,160 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
